column4: Is it possible to just put the .iso W7 disc in then restart my computer and format the hard drive then install windows fresh? I'm not concerned with losing anything as there's nothing on here.  Then after windows is installed install Ubuntu back?
Because what you just said I have no idea how to do.  If what I said isn't possible I'll have to read up and expand my knowledge before trying.
yes, that will work, it could take a long time though
